1: <pb/><e>A ton bit David ti'</e> <pb/><t>Chin bitni yuj a camc'ulal c'al yuj a tojolal. Ach Jehová, chach in bitnej.</t>
2: <t>Chi yochej in c'ul chin beybalnej tojolal. ¿Bak'in ok ach jay ayin? C'am jabok yob ok al-lay yin in beybal, tamwal bay watut, c'am tzet yetal.</t>
3: <t>C'am bak'in ok in tok t'anan yin yob nabalej. <pb/>C'am chi wochej eb yob yak'on yetok Dios. C'am bak'in tol ok in cha' jay eb in c'atan.</t>
4: <t>Najattac'al ok wacantok eb yob is nabal, c'am chi yal in c'ul chin oc yetok yobtakil.</t>
5: <t>Ok wak' tz'injok juntzan eb chi yal k'umal is vecino yin ewantakil. Man ok techaj wuj mac chi mimanej ba.</t>
6: <pb/><t>Ok wil mactxel eb ikem cajan ec' bay tx'otx' tx'otx' ti', yet watx' chi cajay eb wetok. Asan eb watx' beybal ok oc in chekbejok.</t>
7: <t>Maj je' yayji eb etnem anima bay in despacho, maj je' yayji ec' junok naom aj k'anej in satak.</t>
8: <t>Junjunc'al c'u ok wak' c'aycan el eb yobtakwom cajan sat co tx'otx' ti', ok wak' lajwok el masanil eb unem yobtakil yul a conob, Mamin Jehová.</t>
